title: Tristana Rocket Girl Skin's Audio Effect Bug [GAMEPLAY]
body:
When using any abilities while playing as Rocket Girl Tristana, the audio of those abilities are the same as her default skin's abilities audio.

Here's a video showing what the Rocket Girl's audio sounds like
https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=85LQtVz8aCU

Steps:
1- Start a match 
2- Select Tristana and her Rocket Girl skin
3- Cast any abilities in game and listen

(Rocket Jump's landing and Explosive Charge's explosion plays the correct audio for that skin).

You were able to fix Fire Fighter Tristana's audio in patch 5.8 and I hope her Rocket Girl Skin's audio get fixed soon.

replies.body:
Hiya, thanks for the report! 

We'll see what happened with the audio in this skin!
